Html:
Hi, I've just complete the "Custom Captions Button" feature.

Everything is checked-in.

Also, notice that now:
- Library has been refactored and use a new name "Lizard"
- The fsl files have changed

I also think that we should support several "SkinRenderer". By default we use "images" that are
defined in the SkinsEditor. We should also be able to have a custom renderer that "draw" the window
and the button.

We can even add a specific "rendering language" or use the XAML etc...

It is just an idea

Regards

I do agree with you: we should base our skinning framework on top of a solid Skin xml definition and then use it to render our stuff. Forget about FSL or just use this file format as a compressed binary skin.

That's the way I would see it.
